languages.text: {n}При виде вас глаза Маражая вспыхивают бирюзовым огнем — немедленной, неудержимой жаждой убийства. Друкари хватается за клинки, висящие у него на поясе — и застывает от окрика исколотого металлом ксеноса.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}При виде вас глаза Маражая вспыхивают бирюзовым огнем — немедленной, неудержимой жаждой убийства. Друкари хватается за клинки, висящие у него на поясе — и застывает от окрика исколотого металлом ксеноса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋一看到你，眼中就闪烁起了绿松石色的烈焰。他几乎无法控制他的怒火，想要立刻杀了你。他刚刚握紧挂在腰带上的刀柄，另一个身上刺着金属钉的异形就对他喊了些什么，他僵在了那里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋一看到你，眼中就闪烁起了绿松石色的烈焰。他几乎无法控制他的怒火，想要立刻杀了你。他刚刚握紧挂在腰带上的刀柄，另一个身上刺着金属钉的异形就对他喊了些什么，他僵在了那里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux turquoise de Marazhai s'embrasent à votre approche, comme s'il ressentait un besoin urgent et incontrôlable de vous tuer. Le Drukhari se saisit des lames qui pendent à sa ceinture, mais se fige au son de la voix du xénos bardé de métal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux turquoise de Marazhai s'embrasent à votre approche, comme s'il ressentait un besoin urgent et incontrôlable de vous tuer. Le Drukhari se saisit des lames qui pendent à sa ceinture, mais se fige au son de la voix du xénos bardé de métal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai brillan con fuego turquesa al verte: le invade un ansia inmediata e incontrolable de matar. El Drukhari agarra las hojas que cuelgan de su cinturón y... se detiene al oír el grito del xenos cubierto de metal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai brillan con fuego turquesa al verte: le invade un ansia inmediata e incontrolable de matar. El Drukhari agarra las hojas que cuelgan de su cinturón y... se detiene al oír el grito del xenos cubierto de metal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたを見たマラズハイの目に、ターコイズ色の炎が燃え上がる。やがて抑えきれないほどの殺意が湧き上がった。デュカーリはベルトに提げた刃を手にとり、金属が刺さった異種族のような叫び声を上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたを見たマラズハイの目に、ターコイズ色の炎が燃え上がる。やがて抑えきれないほどの殺意が湧き上がった。デュカーリはベルトに提げた刃を手にとり、金属が刺さった異種族のような叫び声を上げる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als er dich erblickt, flammt in Marazhais Augen türkises Feuer auf — ein sofortiger, unkontrollierbarer Drang zu töten. Der Drukhari greift nach den Klingen an seinem Gürtel ... und erstarrt, als der metallbesetzte Xenos ihn anplärrt:{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als er dich erblickt, flammt in Marazhais Augen türkises Feuer auf — ein sofortiger, unkontrollierbarer Drang zu töten. Der Drukhari greift nach den Klingen an seinem Gürtel ... und erstarrt, als der metallbesetzte Xenos ihn anplärrt:{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seni gören Marazhai'ın gözleri, hararetle tutuşuyor... İçini hemen seni öldürme arzusu dolduruyor. Drukhari, kemerinden sarkan bıçakları eline alsa da metalle kaplı zenonun bağırmasıyla donakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes flare with turquoise fire at the sight of you — an immediate, uncontrollable urge to kill. The Drukhari seizes the blades hanging from his belt — and freezes at the shout of the metal-studded xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seni görünce Marazhai'ın gözleri hararetle tutuşuyor... İçini hemen seni öldürme arzusu doldurmuş. Drukhari, kemerinden sarkan bıçakları eline alıyor ancak metalle kaplı zenonun bağırmasıyla donakalıyor.{/n}
